content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Great challange, maybe on the easy side

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's good (maybe a little bit to easy), and easily solvable under 5 minutes.
I hope you received enough feedback from the community to improve your contribution. Once you have made the necessary updates, publish your contribution!
I took the liberty of editing the description for ASCII ART to be in monospace

The example output shown in the Goal doesn't match the expected output.
You should be able to fix the spacing by using `s to force monospace (note that you'll probably need to 'test in IDE' for it to look right)

Tests and validators should not have the same inputs.
You currently have two tests with the same input (2), and one test, two validators with the same input (1).
Thank you a lot for that. I didn't notice that it didn't work without those.
